title: Oral Proficiency Development for Pre-Service Science Teachers: Mixed-Methods-Based Pedagogical Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Science subject content knowledge and foundational understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based LMS access environment, optimized for asynchronous learning for working professionals

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can utilize three or more oral communication strategies when designing science lessons
Participants can evaluate their teaching behaviors by applying the classroom interaction analysis tool (EVALOE)
Learners can improve oral explanation skills by 20% or more through peer feedback and self-reflection

resources: Oral Instruction Guidelines for Science Subjects
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
